name: Jampion
description:
This game was written for the Extra Credits Game Design Jam (https://itch.io/jam/extra-credits-game-design-jam).

Since the the theme was "Awesome Per Second", the idea was to show that a longer play time does not make a game better. I tried to demonstrate this by giving the player the choice between two characters (one is slow and weak while the other is fast and strong) to complete the same goal.
